item.description: Have you heard, you don't need a special meetup invite to join us Tuesday Night for karaoke. This is a great night of fun, fantastic singers, great food and drink and an overall good time for all. Tuesdays are like the new Friday Nights. Lots of people and plenty to do, we got darts, pool table, great karaoke singer a great song selection, and great atmosphere. Get up on the stage and under the lights and you bee the star for a few minutes. Power professional sound system that kicks. So get yourself down here Tuesday and join the fun!!!!!!
item.name: Tuesday Night Karaoke @ The Rosebud in Somerville
